body: A group of Israeli indie musicians have gathered to create a song, entitled Children of Liberty, expressing their support of the Egyptian people's newly acquired freedom, and have a "toast" to new neighbors, human rights and equality in both countries.
original_body: A group of Israeli indie musicians have gathered to create a song, entitled Children of Liberty, expressing their support of the Egyptian people's newly acquired freedom, and have a "toast" to new neighbors, human rights and equality in both countries.
title: Israel: A Music Video Celebrating Egypt's New Freedom

sentence: A group of Israeli indie musicians have gathered to create a song, entitled Children of Liberty, expressing their support of the Egyptian people's newly acquired freedom, and have a "toast" to new neighbors, human rights and equality in both countries.
